meta.title: SkipFeed - Skip the scroll, find what matters
meta.description: Multi-platform search aggregation app for efficient content discovery across YouTube, Reddit, Twitter, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook and more.

hero.subtitle: Skip the scroll, find what matters
hero.description: Search across multiple platforms efficiently. Save time, stay focused, and discover content that actually matters to you.

platforms.title: Search Across All Major Platforms
platforms.description: One app to search them all. Skip the endless scrolling and find exactly what you're looking for.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Users
features.description: Everything you need to search smarter, not harder.

search.title: Multi-Platform Search
search.description: Search across YouTube, Reddit, Twitter, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Google, and Bing all from one place.

analytics.title: Smart Analytics
analytics.description: Track your search patterns, time saved, and focus score. Understand your digital consumption habits.

widgets.title: Home Screen Widgets
widgets.description: Quick access to your search stats and time saved right from your home screen.

languages.title: 11 Languages Supported
languages.description: Use SkipFeed in your preferred language with full localization support.

efficiency.title: Time Efficiency
efficiency.description: Stop endless scrolling. Calculate how much time you save with focused searching.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All your data stays on your device. No tracking, no data collection, just private searching.

cta.title: Ready to Skip the Feed?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who have already transformed their search experience.

footer.description: Skip the scroll, find what matters. Multi-platform search made simple.
